title: org.apache.lucene.util.bytesref exception in analysis.jsp
description:
After reverting to previous revision, analysts.jsp worked again. Can someone fix this?

comments.author: Okke Klein
comments.content:
Prolly Tomcat giving me hard time.

Replacing with old file and reload resolved issue.
